sprintGoal: Polish platform, optimize performance, ensure accessibility, and prepare for production launch

tasks.title: Performance optimization audit and implementation
tasks.description: Conduct comprehensive performance audit and implement optimizations across platform
acceptanceCriteria: Database query optimization: identify and optimize slow queries (aim for <100ms)
Add missing indexes based on query patterns
Redis caching strategy review and optimization
CDN configuration for all static assets
Code splitting and bundle size optimization
Performance monitoring dashboard (New Relic, DataDog, or custom)

technicalNotes.tools: pgAdmin for query analysis, Artillery/k6 for load testing, Chrome DevTools for frontend profiling
technicalNotes.targets: Core Web Vitals: LCP <2.5s, FID <100ms, CLS <0.1
technicalNotes.caching: Review all cache TTLs, implement cache warming for popular content
technicalNotes.cdn: Cloudflare or similar for assets, images, and API caching

tasks.title: Frontend performance optimization
tasks.description: Optimize React app performance, bundle size, and loading times
acceptanceCriteria: Bundle size analysis and optimization (aim for <500KB initial)

technicalNotes.tools: Webpack Bundle Analyzer, Lighthouse, React DevTools Profiler
technicalNotes.virtual: react-window or react-virtualized for long lists

tasks.title: Comprehensive accessibility (WCAG 2.1 AA) audit and fixes
tasks.description: Ensure platform meets WCAG 2.1 AA standards across all pages
acceptanceCriteria: Keyboard navigation works on all pages (tab order logical)
ARIA labels on all interactive elements
Color contrast ratios: 4.5:1 text, 3:1 UI components

technicalNotes.tools: Axe DevTools, WAVE, Lighthouse accessibility audit, screen readers
technicalNotes.testing: Manual testing with keyboard only, test with screen reader

tasks.title: SEO optimization and meta tags
tasks.description: Implement comprehensive SEO strategy with meta tags, sitemaps, and structured data
acceptanceCriteria: Dynamic meta tags on all pages (title, description, OG tags)
Structured data (JSON-LD): Organization, Article, JobPosting, Person
XML sitemap generated and updated automatically
RSS feeds for news and forum
Social media preview cards (Twitter, Facebook, LinkedIn)

technicalNotes.library: next-seo or react-helmet-async for meta tags
technicalNotes.sitemap: Generate dynamically or via cron job
technicalNotes.structured: JSON-LD format for all entity types
technicalNotes.validation: Google Rich Results Test, Facebook Sharing Debugger

tasks.title: Security audit and hardening
tasks.description: Conduct security audit and implement security best practices
acceptanceCriteria: Input validation on all endpoints (Zod schemas)
Authentication security: bcrypt rounds >=12, JWT secure config
Security headers: CSP, X-Frame-Options, X-Content-Type-Options, HSTS
Environment variables secure (no secrets in code)
File upload security (type validation, size limits, virus scanning)
Error messages don't leak sensitive info

technicalNotes.tools: OWASP ZAP, Snyk for dependency scanning, npm audit
technicalNotes.validation: Strict Zod schemas with whitelist approach
technicalNotes.audit: Consider third-party security audit before launch

tasks.title: GDPR compliance implementation
tasks.description: Ensure full GDPR compliance with data privacy features
acceptanceCriteria: Cookie consent banner (categorized: necessary, functional, analytics, marketing)
Data export functionality (JSON format, all user data)
Data deletion (right to be forgotten - anonymize, not hard delete)
Email unsubscribe links in all emails
Age verification (13+ or 16+ depending on jurisdiction)

technicalNotes.consent: Store consent log: user_id, consent_type, granted, timestamp
technicalNotes.export: Generate JSON with all user data across all tables
technicalNotes.deletion: Anonymize user_id → 'deleted_user_xxx', keep content for integrity
technicalNotes.retention: Define retention periods per data type (e.g., logs 90 days)

tasks.title: Build legal pages and cookie consent
tasks.description: Create privacy policy, terms of service, and cookie consent UI
acceptanceCriteria: Cookie consent banner on first visit
Banner categories: necessary, functional, analytics, marketing
Accept all / Reject all / Customize buttons
Footer links to all legal pages

technicalNotes.integration: Disable analytics/marketing scripts until consent given

tasks.title: Error handling and monitoring setup
tasks.description: Implement comprehensive error tracking, logging, and monitoring
acceptanceCriteria: Sentry error tracking configured (already done in Sprint 0, verify all services)
Winston logging: structured logs with levels
Error logging: all errors captured with context
Alerting: critical errors, downtime, performance degradation

technicalNotes.sentry: Verify all error sources integrate with Sentry
technicalNotes.alerting: PagerDuty or similar for critical alerts

tasks.title: Build error pages and error boundaries
tasks.description: Create user-friendly error pages and React error boundaries
acceptanceCriteria: 500 error page with retry and support link
React error boundaries catch component errors
Network error handling with user feedback

technicalNotes.boundaries: Wrap route components with error boundaries

tasks.title: Production deployment preparation
tasks.description: Set up production environment, CI/CD, and deployment process
acceptanceCriteria: Production environment configured (AWS, GCP, or Azure)
Database: PostgreSQL managed instance (RDS, Cloud SQL)
CI/CD pipeline: automated tests, build, deploy
Environment variables management (AWS Secrets Manager, Vault)
SSL certificates configured (Let's Encrypt or ACM)
Backup strategy: database daily backups, 30-day retention
Scaling strategy: horizontal scaling for API, vertical for DB

technicalNotes.infrastructure: Use Terraform or CloudFormation for IaC
technicalNotes.ci_cd: GitHub Actions with deploy on merge to main

tasks.title: Content seeding and preparation
tasks.description: Create initial content and data for platform launch
acceptanceCriteria: Seed 47 LLM models with specs and pricing
Create 5-10 sample forum topics with replies

technicalNotes.seeds: Prisma seed scripts for all initial data
technicalNotes.content: High-quality, relevant content that showcases platform features
technicalNotes.quality: All content reviewed for quality and accuracy

tasks.title: Final QA and launch preparation
tasks.description: Comprehensive end-to-end testing and launch checklist completion
acceptanceCriteria: Complete user journey testing (all critical paths)
SEO check (meta tags, sitemaps, structured data)
GDPR compliance check (consent, privacy, data export/delete)
Error handling testing (network errors, server errors)
All P0 and P1 features complete and tested
Support system ready (help center, contact form)

technicalNotes.criteria: Define go/no-go criteria: <5 P1 bugs, >90 Lighthouse scores, <500ms API response, 99.9% uptime in staging

deliverables: Optimized platform performance (Core Web Vitals passing)
Launch-ready platform with all features tested
notes: Sprint 14 is the final sprint before launch. Focus on polish, performance, security, and compliance. Every feature should be production-ready. The platform should feel fast, secure, and professional. Launch checklist must be completed 100% before go-live.
successCriteria: Core Web Vitals: LCP <2.5s, FID <100ms, CLS <0.1
Security: No critical vulnerabilities, OWASP Top 10 mitigated
All legal pages published and reviewed
Team trained on deployment and incident response
launchChecklist: ✓ Team briefed on launch day procedures
risks: Performance issues may surface under real load
Initial content may not engage users as expected
Security vulnerabilities may be discovered post-launch
postLaunchPlan: Monitor error rates, performance, and uptime closely
Gather user feedback through surveys and analytics
Plan Sprint 15+ based on user feedback and priorities
